MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Station View and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:48pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived onsite and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:44am on Sunday, 28 February 2021
